channel.title: Help A Noob To Add Some Objects :P
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Im Using A Devolution 7.0 Server Source And Adding Objects Has Never Really Ocurred To Me Until Now. I Have Never Bothered To Learn And All Tuts Are Different. :P
All Help Is Appreciated But Be Specific With What To Search.
Thanx

item.title: Help A Noob To Add Some Objects :P
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, id, 0, 10); }
Replace xxxx and yyyy with the x & y coords of object, replace id with the id of object. Then add NewObjects(); in case 121:

Read full topic
item.source: Help A Noob To Add Some Objects :P
